column1: '''Lake Evendim''', or '''Nenuial''' ("Lake of Twilight") in [[Sindarin]], was a lake in northern [[Eriador]].
The lake was about 100 miles north of [[the Shire]]. It was approximately 50 miles from north to south and 20 miles east to west<ref name="Map">{{UT
column2: Map}}</ref> and was bounded on the west and south by the Emyn Uial ([[Hills of Evendim]]).<ref>{{UT
column3: Index}}, ''Nenuial''</ref>  The [[Baranduin]] or Brandywine River flowed out of the lake to the east.<ref name="Map"/>
